issue.title: PROXY admin panel enhancement
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

It would be convienient to have different features in the PROXY admin panel, like enabling the :

- listing of policies or configuration per user or role
- listing  of policies or configuration per expired date
- listing  of policies or configuration per configuration
- listing  of policies or configuration per remote server accessed
- listing of 
- etc...

A general discussion and brainstorming should be performed in order to collect ideas and to improve the UI.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Xavier,

Do we have to keep such feature or can we remove it ?
PROXY and SERVICES have been re engineered a lot in new version...

Thanks,

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Some of the needs listed are still relevant BUT as no such feature is asked by the community, I suggest to reject this issue.
